Customers say
Customers find the ovulation test kit easy to use and helpful for family planning, with positive feedback about its accuracy in detecting ovulation. However, the functionality receives mixed reviews - while some find it accurate, others report that up to 50% of the kits are defective. Moreover, customers consider the product a waste of money and express concerns about poor quality.

Anu
Easy to Use & Accurate – Helpful for Planning Pregnancy
Reviewed in India on 11 August 2025
Size: 5 count (Pack of 1)Verified Purchase
Very useful product for ladies who are planning for pregnancy. i-Know Ovulation Test Kit is easy to use and gives result in just 5 minutes. The instructions are clear and simple, so no confusion. It helps to know the 5 most fertile days, which is very helpful for family planning. The kit is small and easy to carry also.
Overall, good quality and worth the price. I am happy with the product and recommend to others also.

Customers say
Customers find the pH test strips to be of good quality, easy to use, and accurate, with pretty consistent readings across multiple tests. They consider the product useful for various applications, including school projects, and offer good value for money. The functionality receives mixed feedback, with some saying they work effectively while others report issues. The color change is not significant enough for accurate readings.
